demolition

Class Setup

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.Setup

  • public class Setup
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class for setting up the game, including loading images and the config file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      processing.core.PFont font
      The font used in the game.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> levelFiles
      The list of level file names.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> levelTimes
      The list of level times, corresponding with the file names.
      static java.lang.String RESOURCEPATH

      • enemies

        public java.util.List<Character> enemies(App app,
                                         GraphicsHandler graphicsHandler)
        Sets up the enemy animation frames.
        Parameters:
        app - The app object.
        graphicsHandler - The GraphicsHandler object used in the app.
        Returns:
        A new, empty list used for enemies.

      • parseJSON

        public boolean parseJSON(Player player,
                         java.lang.String filePathExtension)
        Loads the JSON data from the config.json file. This includes loading level file names, level times and the player's lives.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player object.
        filePathExtension - A path prefix for loading the config file. Only used in testing.
        Returns:
        Whether the loading of the config file was successful.

      • loadImages

        public processing.core.PFont loadImages(App app,
                                        GraphicsHandler graphicsHandler)
        Loads other individual images used directly in graphicsHandler.
        Parameters:
        app - The app object.
        graphicsHandler - The GraphicsHandler object used in the app.
        Returns:
        A PFont object represting the font used in the game.
